## IOperationRunnerContext.environment property

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

The environment in which the operation is being executed. A return value of `undefined` indicates that it should inherit the environment from the parent process.

**Signature:**

```typescript
environment: IEnvironment | undefined;
```
